item.title: [Pi] Wtf? [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

You can’t put breaks inside if statements. See the “break;” in both of your item definitions? Delete those.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Wtf? [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Niv3k Niv3k
item.description:
@Niv3k wrote:

Error:

ItemDef.java:260: break outside switch or loop break; ^ ItemDef.java:275: break outside switch or loop break; ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

This is my item def:

/* Hardcoded items start here */ /**/ if(i == 11740) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165 itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt200 itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); break; } if(i == 11741) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 13700;//inventory/drop model ID itemDef.maleEquip1 = 13699;//male equip itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 13699;//female equip itemDef.modelZoom = 1957; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 498; itemDef.modelRotation2= 484; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1; itemDef.name = "Saradomin godsword(dual)"; itemDef.description = "Possibly the most powerful weapon ever.".getBytes(); break; } return itemDef; }

How do i fix this?

Read full topic
